content.text:
# Draft:La Boheme Awards

----
}}
La Boheme Awards is a Russian award in the field of the fashion industry that has been awarded since 2018..
The award is given annually La Boheme Magazine.
The award was registered with Rosstandart as voluntary certification system.
This event received a special award at the "Rupor" award, which is a regional selection of the annual national award of Russia Silver Archer.
At different times, the following fashion figures became laureates: Vyacheslav Zaitsev, Valentin Yudashkin etc.
Ceremonies
The awards ceremony took place at various fashion events, sometimes closing them
